task.title: In Oxygen XML Editor, how do I add a new document to the shared DITA repository on Webserve?
task.shortdesc: Adding a new document to the shared DITA repository using Oxygen

taskbody.prereq: You must have mapped a drive to the repository on Webserve, and have the DITA KB Oxygen project open in Oxygen Editor. For instructions, see

step.cmd: In the Project window, open the dmm3 folder.
In the New window, in the text box that says Type filter text, type kbtopic and press Enter.
Enter the four-letter docid for the topic.
Verify that the dmm3 directory is selected to save the file into and click Save.
In the Project window, verify that the new file appears in the dmm3 folder. If it doesn't, right-click within the Project window and select Refresh, and it should appear.

taskbody.result: The new file is now saved on the server and added to the Oxygen project.
